definitions: the state or quality of being free from agitation or strong emotion

examples.text: those who worked with him refer time and again to his calmness under pressure
she exuded calmness and good humor

shortDefinitions: state or quality of being free from agitation or strong emotion

definitions: the state or condition of being free from disturbance or violent activity

examples.text: this relative calmness ended at around 7 a.m., when the wind picked up speed

shortDefinitions: state or condition of being free from disturbance or violent activity
